name: Codepen.io: More darkness
description: added more black color to the redesign of codepen, like the activity menu and the profile menu in the top of the website(when logged in)
additional_info:
• 1.0
    • Initial
  • 1.01
    • Added:
      • Style for blog
      • Style for iframe background
      • Style for collections
    • Updated:
      • Default background color
  • 1.1
    • Added:
      • Style for in-editor assets manager(the upload message going under the footer is codepen's css, i have made an issue in their repo on github)
      • Style for share modul
      • Style for view modul
      • Style for export modul
      • Style for view modul
  • 1.11
    • Removed:
      • Background from iframe(when no background is set in the pens css it just shows the iframe background)
  • 1.12
    • Updated:
      • Colors on hover effects of the share and export modul
  • 1.2
    • Added:
      • Style for blog posts
      • More styles for view changer
    • Updated:
      • "!important" on some color(sadly needed)
      • changed how svgs are targeted
  • 1.3
    • Added:
      • Some !importants
      • Styles for inputboxes and textareas
    • Updated:
      • The whole stylesheet, converted to sass for easier editing
  • 1.31
    • Updated:
      • Style for editor search
  • 1.32
    • Added:
      • Style for Following You Badge
